content: drops easter knitted drops socks with norwegian pattern in karisma drops extra 0-910 drops design pattern no u-703 yarn group b sizes woman-woman-woman-men us 5/6½ - 7½/9 - 9½/10½ - 11½/13 eu 35/37 - 38/40 41/43 - 44/46 foot length 22-24-27-30 cm / 8¾ -9½ -10½ -11 3/4 leg length 23-24-25-26 cm / 9 -9½ -9 3/4 -10 1/4 materials drops karisma from garnstudio 100-100-150-150 g color no 52 dark mustard 50-50-100-100 g color no 01 off white 50-50-50-50 g color no 21 medium gray drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm / us 4 - or size needed to get 22 sts x 30 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm / us 1 5 for rib worked in the round on double pointed needles uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=6120&cid=19
